price: Зато ништа не поредите са Аллахом! Аллах, заиста, зна, а ви не знате!
arabic: فَلَا تَضۡرِبُواْ لِلَّهِ ٱلۡأَمۡثَالَۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعۡلَمُ وَأَنتُمۡ لَا تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: falā taḍribū lillahi al-amthāla inna al-laha yaʿlamu wa-antum lā taʿlamūna
